00022  * Purpose:
00023  *  - example without DTrack remote commands: collects DTrack data

00029 #include "DTrack.hpp"
00030 
00031 #include <iostream>
00032 #include <sstream>
00033 
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 // global DTrack
00037 static DTrack* dt = NULL;
00038 
00039 
00043 static void output_to_console()
00044 {
00045         cout.precision(3);
00046         cout.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield);
00047 
00048         cout << endl << "frame " << dt->get_framecounter() << " ts " << dt->get_timestamp()
00049              << " nbod " << dt->get_num_body() << " nfly " << dt->get_num_flystick()
00050              << " nmea " << dt->get_num_meatool() << " nhand " << dt->get_num_hand()
00051              << " nmar " << dt->get_num_marker() << endl;
00052 
00053         // bodies:
00054         dtrack_body_type body;
00055         for(int i=0; i<dt->get_num_body(); i++){
00056                 body = dt->get_body(i);
00057 
00058                 if(body.quality < 0){
00059                         cout << "bod " << body.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00060                 }else{
00061                         cout << "bod " << body.id << " qu " << body.quality
00062                              << " loc " << body.loc[0] << " " << body.loc[1] << " " << body.loc[2]
00063                              << " rot " << body.rot[0] << " " << body.rot[1] << " " << body.rot[2]
00064                              << " " << body.rot[3] << " " << body.rot[4] << " " << body.rot[5]
00065                              << " " << body.rot[6] << " " << body.rot[7] << " " << body.rot[8] << endl;
00066                 }
00067         }
00068 
00069         // A.R.T. FlySticks:
00070         dtrack_flystick_type flystick;
00071         for(int i=0; i<dt->get_num_flystick(); i++){
00072                 flystick = dt->get_flystick(i);
00073 
00074                 if(flystick.quality < 0){
00075                         cout << "fly " << flystick.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00076                 }else{
00077                         cout << "flystick " << flystick.id << " qu " << flystick.quality
00078                              << " loc " << flystick.loc[0] << " " << flystick.loc[1] << " " << flystick.loc[2]
00079                              << " rot " << flystick.rot[0] << " " << flystick.rot[1] << " " << flystick.rot[2]
00080                              << " " << flystick.rot[3] << " " << flystick.rot[4] << " " << flystick.rot[5]
00081                              << " " << flystick.rot[6] << " " << flystick.rot[7] << " " << flystick.rot[8] << endl;
00082                 }
00083 
00084                 cout << "      btn";
00085                 for(int j=0; j<flystick.num_button; j++){
00086                         cout << " " << flystick.button[j];
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 cout << " joy";
00090                 for(int j=0; j<flystick.num_joystick; j++){
00091                         cout << " " << flystick.joystick[j];
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 cout << endl;
00095         }
00096 
00097         // measurement tools:
00098         dtrack_meatool_type meatool;
00099         for(int i=0; i<dt->get_num_meatool(); i++){
00100                 meatool = dt->get_meatool(i);
00101 
00102                 if(meatool.quality < 0){
00103                         cout << "mea " << meatool.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00104                 }else{
00105                         cout << "mea " << meatool.id << " qu " << meatool.quality
00106                              << " loc " << meatool.loc[0] << " " << meatool.loc[1] << " " << meatool.loc[2]
00107                              << " rot " << meatool.rot[0] << " " << meatool.rot[1] << " " << meatool.rot[2]
00108                              << " " << meatool.rot[3] << " " << meatool.rot[4] << " " << meatool.rot[5]
00109                              << " " << meatool.rot[6] << " " << meatool.rot[7] << " " << meatool.rot[8] << endl;
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 if (meatool.num_button) {
00113                         cout << "      btn";
00114                         for(int j=0; j<meatool.num_button; j++){
00115                                 cout << " " << meatool.button[j];
00116                         }
00117                         cout << endl;
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 
00121         // markers:
00122         dtrack_marker_type marker;
00123         for(int i=0; i<dt->get_num_marker(); i++){
00124                 marker = dt->get_marker(i);
00125 
00126                 cout << "mar " << marker.id << " qu " << marker.quality
00127                      << " loc " << marker.loc[0] << " " << marker.loc[1] << " " << marker.loc[2] << endl;
00128         }
00129 
00130         // A.R.T. Fingertracking hands:
00131         dtrack_hand_type hand;
00132         for(int i=0; i<dt->get_num_hand(); i++){
00133                 hand = dt->get_hand(i);
00134 
00135                 if(hand.quality < 0){
00136                         cout << "hand " << hand.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00137                 }else{
00138                         cout << "hand " << hand.id << " qu " << hand.quality
00139                              << " lr " << ((hand.lr == 0) ? "left" : "right") << " nf " << hand.nfinger
00140                              << " loc " << hand.loc[0] << " " << hand.loc[1] << " " << hand.loc[2]
00141                              << " rot " << hand.rot[0] << " " << hand.rot[1] << " " << hand.rot[2]
00142                              << " " << hand.rot[3] << " " << hand.rot[4] << " " << hand.rot[5]
00143                              << " " << hand.rot[6] << " " << hand.rot[7] << " " << hand.rot[8] << endl;
00144 
00145                         for(int j=0; j<hand.nfinger; j++){
00146                                 cout << "       fi " << j
00147                                      << " loc " << hand.finger[j].loc[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].loc[1] << " " << hand.finger[j].loc[2]
00148                                      << " rot " << hand.finger[j].rot[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[1] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[2]
00149                                      << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[3] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[4] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[5]
00150                                      << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[6] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[7] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[8] << endl;
00151                                 cout << "       fi " << j
00152                                      << " tip " << hand.finger[j].radiustip
00153                                      << " pha " << hand.finger[j].lengthphalanx[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].lengthphalanx[1]
00154                                      << " " << hand.finger[j].lengthphalanx[2]
00155                                      << " ang " << hand.finger[j].anglephalanx[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].anglephalanx[1] << endl;
00156                         }
00157                 }
00158         }
00159 }
00160 
00161 
00167 static bool error_to_console()
00168 {
00169         if(dt->timeout()){
00170                 cout << "--- timeout while waiting for udp data" << endl;
00171                 return false;
00172         }
00173 
00174         if(dt->udperror()){
00175                 cout << "--- error while receiving udp data" << endl;
00176                 return false;
00177         }
00178 
00179         if(dt->parseerror()){
00180                 cout << "--- error while parsing udp data" << endl;
00181                 return false;
00182         }
00183 
00184         return true;
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00191 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00192 {
00193         if(argc != 2){
00194                 cout << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " <data port>" << endl;
00195                 return -1;
00196         }
00197 
00198         istringstream portstream(argv[1]);
00199         int port;
00200         portstream >> port;  // data port
00201 
00202 
00203         if(portstream.fail() || port <=0 || port >= 65536){
00204                 cout << "invalid port '" << argv[1] << "'" << endl;
00205                 return -2;
00206         }
00207 
00208         // init library:
00209         dt = new DTrack(port);
00210 
00211         if(!dt->valid()){
00212                 cout << "DTrack init error" << endl;
00213                 return -3;
00214         }
00215 
00216         // receiving:
00217         int loop_count = 0;
00218         while(loop_count++ < 100){
00219 
00220                 if(dt->receive()){
00221                         output_to_console();
00222                 } else {
00223                         error_to_console();
00224                 }
00225 
00226         }
00227 
00228         //clean up:
00229         delete dt;
00230 
00231         return 0;
00232 }
